description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Color Ball is a fast and fun casual game for your XBOX 360 game console.  Play over 100 levels of fun.  Shooting the colored balls into the goals to score points.  Combine primary colored balls to create a secondary colored ball. Separate secondary colored balls into two primary colored balls.
